Welcome to TraqWords, your ultimate solution for seamlessly managing word counts within Gmail! Say goodbye to the tedious task of downloading attachments just to check their word count.

TraqWords empowers you to streamline your workflow by providing instant access to accurate word counts directly within your Gmail inbox. Whether you’re a freelance writer, editor, translator, or simply someone who deals with document-heavy emails, TraqWords revolutionizes the way you handle document management. Experience unparalleled efficiency and productivity with TraqWords – your trusted companion for hassle-free word count tracking in Gmail.
